sourcesContent:
Terms of Service

Our terms and conditions that govern your use of Thrifto's platform and services.

Last updated: April 5, 2024

Key Terms at a Glance

The essential points you should know about using our platform

Account Responsibility

You're responsible for maintaining your account security and all activities under your account.

Fair Trading

All users must trade fairly, provide accurate descriptions, and follow our community guidelines.

Platform Protection

We reserve the right to protect our platform and users from harmful or fraudulent activities.

Legal Compliance

All users must comply with applicable laws and regulations when using our services.

Agreement to Terms

By accessing or using Thrifto's website and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

Important Notice

These terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Thrifto. Please read them carefully.

Account Registration

To use certain features of our service, you must register for an account. You agree to:

Accurate Information

Provide accurate and complete information during registration

Account Security

Maintain the security of your account credentials

Keep Updated

Promptly update your account information when necessary

Account Responsibility

Accept responsibility for all activities under your account

User Conduct

When using our services, you agree not to:

Illegal Activities

Violate any applicable laws or regulations

IP Infringement

Infringe on intellectual property rights

False Content

Post false, misleading, or fraudulent content

Harassment

Harass, abuse, or harm other users

Buying & Selling

For Sellers

  • Accurately describe item conditions
  • Set fair and reasonable prices
  • Own or have the right to sell items
  • Ship items within specified timeframes

For Buyers

  • Pay for items you commit to purchase
  • Provide accurate shipping information
  • Follow our return policy guidelines
  • Communicate respectfully with sellers

Fees and Payments

Commission Fees

Sellers pay a small commission on successful sales to keep the platform running

Payment Processing

Standard payment processing fees apply for all transactions

Tax Obligations

Users are responsible for any applicable taxes on their transactions

Contact Information

For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

legal@thrifto.com
1-800-555-1234
Romania, Cluj-Napoca, Strada Teodor Mihali

Have Questions?

Need clarification on any of these terms? Our legal team is here to help.

Contact Legal Team

Stay Informed

We'll notify you of any changes to these terms via email and platform notifications.
